name: Podcaster
description: Set-up FREE Django Podcasts & Blog page in minutes.

ENV.description: Environment name. Changing this value will cause your app to run in DEBUG mode. You can change it once deployed.

SECRET_KEY.description: Django-generated secret key. You can change it once deployed.

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Address of your webpage. YOUR_APP_NAME - name of your app you have just chosen.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Fill ONLY if you don't want to pay for 5$ AWS Heroku addon and you have AWS S3 Key ID - check the tutorial on GitHub if you don't.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Fill ONLY if you don't want to pay for 5$ AWS Heroku addon and you have AWS S3 Access Key - check the tutorial on GitHub if you don't.

AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME.description: Fill ONLY if you don't want to pay for 5$ AWS Heroku addon and you have AWS S3 Bucket name - check the tutorial on GitHub if you don't.
